<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_438</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_438</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Partición periódica del plano en los grabados de Escher</string>
            <string language="en">Escher's_tessellations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Escher's_tessellations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Escher's_tessellations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escher's_tessellations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Escher's_tessellations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Escher</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones cuestiones geométricas que aparecen en algunos de los cuadros de M.C. Escher. Se analizan los problemas de particiones del plano mediante teselaciones.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain some of the geometrical patterns found in the work of M.C. Escher. It also analyses the problem of partitioning the plane with tiles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">arte</string>
            <string language="en">art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Escher</string>
            <string language="en">Escher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teselas</string>
            <string language="en">tiles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plano</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche 
Gebrauchsimulationen, zum einige der geometrischen Muster zu erklären
in der Arbeit von M.C. Escher fand. Sie analysiert auch das 
Problem des Verteilens der Fläche mit Fliesen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations pour expliquer certaines des configurations 
géométriques a trouvées dans le travail de M.C. Escher. Il 
analyse également le problème de diviser l'avion avec des tuiles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos para 
explicar alguns dos testes padrões geométricos encontrou no trabalho
de M.C. Escher. Analisa também o problema de dividir o plano 
com telhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi per 
spiegare alcuni dei modelli geometrici ha trovato nel lavoro di M.C. 
Escher. Egualmente analizza il problema di dividere l'aereo con 
le mattonelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις 
προσομοιώσεις για να εξηγήσει μερικών από τα γεωμετρικά πρότυπα 
βρήκε στην εργασία M.C. Escher. Αναλύει επίσης το 
πρόβλημα το αεροπλάνο με τα κεραμίδια.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Escher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fliesen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Escher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tuiles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">avion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
